AtomNode.trailing: -- Enforce naming conventions for index variables.

CommandDoccommentNode.comment:
Returns an array of all elements of `Fin n` in order, starting at `0`.
Examples: * `Array.finRange 0 = (#[] : Array (Fin 0))` * `Array.finRange 2 = (#[0, 1] : Array (Fin 2))` -/

AtomNode.val:
Returns an array of all elements of `Fin n` in order, starting at `0`.
Examples: * `Array.finRange 0 = (#[] : Array (Fin 0))` * `Array.finRange 2 = (#[0, 1] : Array (Fin 2))` -/

OtherNode.state_before: n : Nat ⊢ (Array.finRange n).size = n
n i : Nat h : i < (Array.finRange n).size ⊢ (Array.finRange n)[i] = Fin.cast ⋯ ⟨i, h⟩
⊢ Array.finRange 0 = #[]
n : Nat ⊢ Array.finRange (n + 1) = #[0] ++ map Fin.succ (Array.finRange n)
OtherNode.state_after:
case h₁ n : Nat ⊢ (Array.finRange (n + 1)).size = (#[0] ++ map Fin.succ (Array.finRange n)).size

case h₂.h n i✝ : Nat hi₁✝ : i✝ < (Array.finRange (n + 1)).size hi₂✝ : i✝ < (#[0] ++ map Fin.succ (Array.finRange n)).size ⊢ ↑(Array.finRange (n + 1))[i✝] = ↑(#[0] ++ map Fin.succ (Array.finRange n))[i✝]
OtherNode.state_after: case h₂.h n i✝ : Nat hi₁✝ : i✝ < (Array.finRange (n + 1)).size hi₂✝ : i✝ < (#[0] ++ map Fin.succ (Array.finRange n)).size ⊢ i✝ = ↑(if h : i✝ = 0 then 0 else ⟨i✝ - 1 + 1, ⋯⟩)

OtherNode.state_before: case h₂.h n i✝ : Nat hi₁✝ : i✝ < (Array.finRange (n + 1)).size hi₂✝ : i✝ < (#[0] ++ map Fin.succ (Array.finRange n)).size ⊢ i✝ = ↑(if h : i✝ = 0 then 0 else ⟨i✝ - 1 + 1, ⋯⟩)
case h₂.h.isFalse n i✝ : Nat hi₁✝ : i✝ < (Array.finRange (n + 1)).size hi₂✝ : i✝ < (#[0] ++ map Fin.succ (Array.finRange n)).size h✝ : ¬i✝ = 0 ⊢ i✝ = ↑⟨i✝ - 1 + 1, ⋯⟩

n : Nat ⊢ Array.finRange (n + 1) = map Fin.castSucc (Array.finRange n) ++ #[Fin.last n]

n : Nat ⊢ (Array.finRange n).reverse = map Fin.rev (Array.finRange n)

OtherNode.state_after: case h₂.h n i : Nat h : i < (Array.finRange n).reverse.size hi₂✝ : i < (map Fin.rev (Array.finRange n)).size ⊢ n - 1 - i = n - (i + 1)

Comment.text: -- Enforce naming conventions for index variables.

Returns an array of all elements of `Fin n` in order, starting at `0`.
Examples: * `Array.finRange 0 = (#[] : Array (Fin 0))` * `Array.finRange 2 = (#[0, 1] : Array (Fin 2))` -/
